column1: @NIH #remdesivir study shows NO statistically significant difference in mortality between using remdesivir & placebo. However, decrease in recovery time for those who survived, from 11 days vs 15 days w/placebo. #Gilead #MarketManipulation #coronavirus

Why do I always read “coronavirus” as “carnivorous” !?!

#COVID19 death rate in China is roughly 2%. 10-15x more deadly than the common flu. It’s foolish to not think the US death rate will be lower than China. So the question is, is a virus that’s ~5-8x more deadly than a virus that’s a non-market event worth a 15% haircut?
